meanings.definition: An indefinitely long period of time.
meanings.sent1: It felt like eons waiting for the school bell to ring.
meanings.sent2: The mountains had been standing for eons.
meanings.sent3: After what seemed like eons, the slow turtle finally reached the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The ancient tree had witnessed eons of changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the sky have been shining for eons, lighting up the night.

meanings.definition: A very great or indefinitely long period of time.
meanings.sent1: The library held books that dated back eons.
meanings.sent2: She had been searching for her lost ring for eons.
meanings.sent3: The line at the amusement park moved at an eons-long pace.
meanings.sent4: The old ruins stood as a testament to the eons that had passed.
meanings.sent5: The river had carved its path over eons, shaping the landscape around it.
